Europa League
Oleksandria - ASSE: which team for Puel?
The Greens are playing their future tonight in this 4th day of the Europa League. When traveling to Ukraine, Puel players have to win against Oleksandria
07 Nov 2019, 10:40 by Charlie Creteur



Harold MoukoudiClub previous: Le HavreTransfer fee: noneIcon Sport



Jean-Eudes Aholou Previous club: AS MonacoTransfer fee: none (ready) Icon Sport



Alpha SissokoClub previous: ClermontTransfer allowance: noneIcon Sport



Yohan CabayeClub previous: without clubTransfer fee: noneIcon Sport



Sergi PalenciaClub previous: FC BarcelonaTransfer allowance: 2 M ‚Ç¨ Icon Sport



Miguel TraucoClub previous: FlamengoTransfer allowance: 1 M ‚Ç¨ Icon Sport



Denis BouangaClub previous: N√Æmes OlympiqueTransfer fee: ‚Ç¨ 4.5 M Icon Sport



Ryad BoudebouzClub previous: Betis SevillaTransfer allowance: 3.5 M ‚Ç¨ Icon Sport



Zaydou Youssouf Previous club: Girondins de BordeauxTransfer allowance: 2 M ‚Ç¨ Icon Sport

ASSE: all the recruits of the transfer window 2019

On the last day of the Europa League, the home side opened the scoring with a goal from Gabriel Silva (8th, 1-0) before the latter scored against their side for the equalizer of Oleksandria (1-1). , 14th). Last of group I in equal points (2) with the Ukrainian team, Saint-Etienne will have to do a lot better tonight to continue to dream in the last 32 of the Europa League.




Without M'Vila and without Saliba!




The probable team of ASSE + 9 üì∑Credit Photo - Demivol√©e

The current 8th in Ligue 1 is not spared by injuries! In addition to Charles Abi (19) and Yohan Cabaye (33), Claude Puel will also have to compose without Yann M'Vila (29) and William Saliba (18). The first suffers a phlebitis at one calf while the second suffers from a fissure of the fifth metatarsal of the foot. Thus Fofana and Perrin would compose the central hinge with the presence of Trauco and Debuchy on the wings. Aholou and Camara would be lined up in the middle with Khazri in 10. All this, followed by a Bouanga-Beric-Nordin attack. As a result, Hamouma would begin on the bench with Boudebouz.
¬†Romain Hamouma: all information about the player
